name: Survival Single
description:
Ratty tried his best to live cautiously in this illusory and blurred reality utopia. In the game, players will try to see the truth and smallness of ratty from the perspective of the main character, who has a choice but is destined to repeat his life sadly.

This game is design and build for China GIGA Game Jam 2020 in 48 hours by a 4-member team.

Game Designer - Yosmi
Art - Egg Zong
Programmer - Fat Seven
Music - Tree Tree
